DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Group Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":50,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Contracted Time","metricFieldValue":"TotalContractedTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Planned Time","metricFieldValue":"TotalPlannedTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Actual Time","metricFieldValue":"TotalActualTime"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  t.TypologyGroup,
		t.ContractedTime,
		t.PlannedTime,
		t.ActualTime,
        sum(ContractedTime) over() as TotalContractedTime,
        sum(PlannedTime) over() as TotalPlannedTime,
        sum(ActualTime) over() as TotalActualTime
from    (
        select  TypologyGroup,
                sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
                sum(PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
                sum(ActualTime) as ActualTime
        from    (
                        select  utg.[Name] as TypologyGroup,
								sum(isnull(pht.ContractedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ContractedTime,
                                0 as PlannedTime,
                                0 as ActualTime
                        from    PlannedHoursTotal pht
									left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pht.Project
									left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup
                        where   pht.GCRecord is null and
								p.[Contract] = @ContractId
						group by utg.[Name]
                        union all
						SELECT
							ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name]) as [TypologyGroup],
                            0 as ContractedTime,
                            SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedTime,
							0 as ActualTime
						FROM   
							dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] u ON (u.Oid = pht.[User])
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypology] ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utg ON (utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup)
							LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utgp ON (utgp.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup),
							dbo.Project p
						WHERE
							pht.GCRecord is null
							AND p.Oid = pht.Project
							/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
						GROUP BY 
							ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name])
                        union all
                        select  utg.Name as TypologyGroup,
                                0 as ContractedTime,
                                0 as PlannedTime,
                                DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0 as ActualTime
                        from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt, [User] usr, UserTypology ust, UserTypologyGroup utg
                        where   tim.Project = prj.Oid and 
                                prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                                usr.Oid = tim.CreatedBy and
                                ust.Oid = usr.Typology and
                                utg.Oid = ust.UserTypologyGroup
                                /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                ) t
        group by TypologyGroup
        ) t"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Monthly Distribution
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Planned Time, Utilization & Income","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":19,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"ActualTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedTimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedTimeGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with met as
(
    select  est.Oid as EstimateOid,
            datefromparts(Year(yrd.Day), Month(yrd.Day), 1) as [Date],
            count(*) over (partition by est.Oid) as Months
    from    Contract cnt, Estimate est, YearDay yrd
    where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
            yrd.Day between cast(est.Date as date) and cast(est.Expiration as date) and
            Day(yrd.Day) = Day(est.Date)
            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and est.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
),
mpj as
(
    select  prj.Oid as ProjectOid,
            datefromparts(Year(yrd.Day), Month(yrd.Day), 1) as [Date],
            count(*) over (partition by prj.Oid) as Months
    from    Contract cnt, Project prj, YearDay yrd
    where   prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
            yrd.Day between cast(prj.BeginDate as date) and cast(prj.EndDate as date) and
            Day(yrd.Day) = Day(prj.BeginDate)
            /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
)
select  v.[Date], 
        IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ResourcesWithVatIncome, null) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
        IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ResourcesWithVatCost, null) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
        v.ContractedTime,
        v.PlannedTime,
        v.ForecastTime,
        v.ActualTime,
        v.ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
        v.PlannedTimeGrandTotal,
        v.ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
        v.ActualTimeGrandTotal
from
(
    select  [Date], 
            sum(ResourcesWithVatIncome) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
            sum(ResourcesWithVatCost) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
            sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
            sum(PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
            sum(ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
            sum(ActualTime) as ActualTime,
            sum(sum(ContractedTime)) over() as ContractedTimeGrandTotal,
            sum(sum(PlannedTime)) over() as PlannedTimeGrandTotal,
            sum(sum(ForecastTime)) over() as ForecastTimeGrandTotal,
            sum(sum(ActualTime)) over() as ActualTimeGrandTotal
    from    (
                select  [Date],
                        sum(ResourcesWithVatIncome) / max(Months) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                        sum(ResourcesWithVatCost) / max(Months) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                        sum(ContractedTime) / max(Months) as ContractedTime,
                        0 as PlannedTime,
                        0 as ForecastTime,
                        0 as ActualTime
                from    (
                        select  est.Oid as EstimateOid,
                                sum(edt.ValueWithVatIncome * eit.Retainer) as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                                sum(edt.ValueWithVatCost * eit.Retainer) as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                                sum(edt.Hours * eit.Retainer) as ContractedTime
                        from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, EstimateItemDetail edt, Contract cnt
                        where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                                eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                                edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                                edt.Type = 2
                                /*[ContractFilter]*/ and est.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                        group by est.Oid
                        ) t, met
                where   met.EstimateOid = t.EstimateOid
                group by t.EstimateOid, [Date]  
                union all
                select  [Date],
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        sum(PlannedTime) / max(Months) as PlannedTime,
                        0 as ForecastTime,
                        0 as ActualTime
                from    (
                        select  prj.Oid as ProjectOid,
                                sum(pht.PlannedMinutes / 60.0) as PlannedTime
                        from    PlannedHoursTotal pht, Project prj, Contract cnt
                        where   prj.Oid = pht.Project and
                                prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                                pht.GCRecord is null 
                                /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                        group by prj.Oid
                        ) t, mpj
                where   mpj.ProjectOid = t.ProjectOid
                group by t.ProjectOid, [Date]  
                union all
                select  datefromparts(Year(pha.Date), Month(pha.Date), 1) as [Date],
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        0 as PlannedTime,
                        sum(pha.AdjustmentMinutes / 60.0) as ForecastTime,
                        0 as ActualTime
                from    PlannedHoursAdjustment pha, Project prj, Contract cnt
                where   prj.Oid = pha.Project and
                        prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                        pha.GCRecord is null 
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                group by Year(pha.Date), Month(pha.Date)
                union all
                select  datefromparts(Year(tim.[Date]), Month(tim.[Date]), 1) as [Date],
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatIncome,
                        0 as ResourcesWithVatCost,
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        0 as PlannedTime,
                        0 as ForecastTime,
                        sum(DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0) as ActualTime
                from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt
                where   prj.Oid = tim.Project and
                        prj.Contract = cnt.Oid
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                group by Year(tim.[Date]), Month(tim.[Date])
            ) t
    group by [Date]
) v
    left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'DeliverablesSellRead')"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Division Contribution
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Utilization","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":36,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"BillableHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedHoursGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"WITH ContractEstimateRates As
(
	select 
		eid.Department, eid.UserTypologyGroup, eid.[User], Max(eid.UnitPriceIncome) as UnitPriceIncome
	from
		dbo.Estimate e
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItem ei on (ei.Estimate = e.Oid)
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid on (eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2)
	where 
		e.GCRecord is null 
		and (e.[Contract] = @ContractId)
		and cast(getdate() as Date) between e.[Date] and e.Expiration
	group by 
		eid.Department, 
		eid.UserTypologyGroup, 
		eid.[User]
)
SELECT
    v.DivisionName,
	sum(v.[ActualHours]) as [ActualHours],
    sum(v.[BillableHours]) as BillableHours,
    sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
	sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
	sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
	IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0.0) as ActualContractedPercentage,
	IIF(sum(v.PlannedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.PlannedHours), 0.0) as ActualPlannedPercentage,
	sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[PlannedHours])) OVER () as PlannedHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal
FROM  
(
	SELECT
		d.[Name] as DivisionName,
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.retainer) as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.Estimate e,
		dbo.EstimateItem ei,
		dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid,
		dbo.Division d
	WHERE
		e.[Contract] = @ContractId
		AND ei.Estimate = e.Oid
		AND eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2
		AND d.Oid = e.Division
	GROUP BY 
		d.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		di.[Name] as DivisionName,
		sum(t.[Hours]) as [ActualHours],
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours))) as BillableHours,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours)) * ISNULL(eidu.UnitPriceIncome, ISNULL(eidt.UnitPriceIncome, 0))) as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t
		left outer join Department de on t.DepartmentId = de.Oid
		left outer join Division di on de.Division = di.Oid
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidu on (eidu.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidu.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidu.[User] = t.UserId)
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidt on (eidt.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidt.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidt.[User] is null)
	WHERE
		/*[/ClientFilter]*/ t.ProjectContractId = @ContractId /*[/ClientFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		di.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		di.[Name] as DivisionName,
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
		left outer join Department de on de.Oid = pht.Department
		left outer join Division di on di.Oid = de.Division,
		dbo.Project p
	WHERE
		pht.GCRecord is null
		AND p.Oid = pht.Project
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		di.[Name]
) v
GROUP BY
	v.DivisionName"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Department Contribution
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Utilization","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":16,"WidgetYPosition":36,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"BillableHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedHoursGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"WITH ContractEstimateRates As
(
	select 
		eid.Department, eid.UserTypologyGroup, eid.[User], Max(eid.UnitPriceIncome) as UnitPriceIncome
	from
		dbo.Estimate e
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItem ei on (ei.Estimate = e.Oid)
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid on (eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2)
	where 
		e.GCRecord is null 
		and (e.[Contract] = @ContractId)
		and cast(getdate() as Date) between e.[Date] and e.Expiration
	group by 
		eid.Department, 
		eid.UserTypologyGroup, 
		eid.[User]
)
SELECT
    v.DepartmentName,
	sum(v.[ActualHours]) as [ActualHours],
    sum(v.[BillableHours]) as BillableHours,
    sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
	sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
	sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
	IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0.0) as ActualContractedPercentage,
	IIF(sum(v.PlannedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.PlannedHours), 0.0) as ActualPlannedPercentage,
	sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[PlannedHours])) OVER () as PlannedHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal
FROM  
(
	SELECT
		d.[Name] as DepartmentName,
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.retainer) as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.Estimate e,
		dbo.EstimateItem ei,
		dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid,
		dbo.Department d
	WHERE
		e.[Contract] = @ContractId
		AND ei.Estimate = e.Oid
		AND eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2
		AND d.Oid = e.Department
	GROUP BY 
		d.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		d.[Name] as DepartmentName,
		sum(t.[Hours]) as [ActualHours],
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours))) as BillableHours,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours)) * ISNULL(eidu.UnitPriceIncome, ISNULL(eidt.UnitPriceIncome, 0))) as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t
		left outer join Department d on t.DepartmentId = d.Oid
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidu on (eidu.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidu.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidu.[User] = t.UserId)
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidt on (eidt.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidt.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidt.[User] is null)
	WHERE
		/*[/ClientFilter]*/ t.[ProjectContractId] = @ContractId /*[/ClientFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		d.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		d.[Name] as DepartmentName,
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
		left outer join Department d on d.Oid = pht.Department,
		dbo.Project p
	WHERE
		pht.GCRecord is null
		AND p.Oid = pht.Project
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		d.[Name]
) v
GROUP BY
	v.DepartmentName"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Summary
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Time per Department and Typology Group","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":19,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"BillableHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"ForecastHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"% Burn","metricFieldValue":"ActualContractedPercentageGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
	v.DepartmentId,
	v.DepartmentName,
	v.UserTypologyGroupId,
	v.UserTypologyGroup,
	v.UserId,
	v.UserName,
	v.Rate,
	v.ContractedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ContractedHoursIncome, null) as ContractedHoursIncome,
	v.PlannedHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.PlannedHoursIncome, null) as PlannedHoursIncome,
	v.ForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ForecastHoursIncome, null) as ForecastHoursIncome,
	v.ActualHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualHoursIncome, null) as ActualHoursIncome,
	v.BillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.BillableHoursIncome, null) as BillableHoursIncome,
	v.NonBillableHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.NonBillableHoursIncome, null) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
	v.ActualBurnPercentageHours,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualBurnPercentageIncome, null) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
	v.ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
	IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome, null) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome,
	v.BillableHoursGrandTotal,
	v.ForecastHoursGrandTotal,
	v.ContractedHoursGrandTotal,
	v.ActualContractedPercentageGrandTotal
from (
	select
			v.Department as DepartmentId,
			d.[Name] as DepartmentName,
			v.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupId,
			utg.[Name] as UserTypologyGroup,
			v.[User] as UserId,
			u.[Name] as UserName,
			sum(v.Rate) as Rate,
			sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
			sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) as ContractedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
			sum(v.PlannedHoursIncome) as PlannedHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
			sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ForecastHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) as ActualHoursIncome,
			sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
			sum(v.NonBillableHoursIncome) as NonBillableHoursIncome,
			sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours) as ActualPlusForecastHours,
			sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome) as ActualPlusForecastIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.ActualHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageHours,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualBurnPercentageIncome,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHours) + sum(v.ForecastHours)) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnPercentage,
			IIF(sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome) > 0, (sum(v.ActualHoursIncome) + sum(v.ForecastHoursIncome)) / sum(v.ContractedHoursIncome), 0) as ActualPlusForecastBurnIncome,
			sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
			sum(sum(v.ForecastHours)) OVER () as ForecastHoursGrandTotal,
			sum(sum(v.ContractedHours)) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal,
			IIF(sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () > 0, sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () / sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER (), 0.0) * 100 as ActualContractedPercentageGrandTotal
		from (
			select
				v.Department,
				v.UserTypologyGroup,
				v.[User],
				sum(v.[Rate]) as Rate,
				sum(v.RateActual) as RateActual,
				sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
				sum(v.ContractedHours) * sum(v.Rate) as ContractedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
				sum(v.PlannedHours) * sum(v.Rate) as PlannedHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ForecastHours) as ForecastHours,
				sum(v.ForecastHours) * sum(v.Rate) as ForecastHoursIncome,
				sum(v.ActualHours) as ActualHours,
				sum(v.ActualHours) * sum(v.RateActual) as ActualHoursIncome,
				sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
				sum(v.BillableHours) * sum(v.RateActual) as BillableHoursIncome,
				sum(v.NonBillableHours) as NonBillableHours,
				sum(v.NonBillableHours) * sum(v.RateActual) as NonBillableHoursIncome
			from (
				select 
					IsNull(pht.Department, IsNull(u.Department, ut.Department)) as Department,
					IsNull(pht.UserTypologyGroup, utg.Oid) as UserTypologyGroup,
					pht.[User],
					Max(isnull(pht.SellRate, 0)) as Rate,
					0 as RateActual,
					sum(isnull(pht.ContractedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ContractedHours,
					sum(isnull(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as PlannedHours,
					0 as ForecastHours,
					0 as ActualHours,
					0 as BillableHours,
					0 as NonBillableHours
				from 
					PlannedHoursTotal pht
						left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pht.Project
						left outer join [User] u on u.Oid = pht.[User]
						left outer join [UserTypology] ut on ut.Oid = u.Typology
						left outer join [UserTypologyGroup] utg on utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup
				where
                    pht.GCRecord is null and
					p.[Contract] = @ContractId
				group by
					pht.Department,
					u.Department,
					ut.Department,
					pht.UserTypologyGroup,
					utg.Oid,
					pht.[User]
				union all
				select
					IsNull(u.Department, ut.Department) as Department,
					IsNull(pha.UserTypologyGroup, utg.Oid) as UserTypologyGroup,
					pha.[User],
					0 as Rate,
					0 as RateActual,
					0 as ContractedHours,
					0 as PlannedHours,
					sum(isnull(pha.AdjustmentMinutes, 0)) / 60.0 as ForecastHours,
					0 as ActualHours,
					0 as BillableHours,
					0 as NonBillableHours
				from
					PlannedHoursAdjustment pha
						left outer join Project p on p.Oid = pha.Project
						left outer join [User] u on u.Oid = pha.[User]
						left outer join [UserTypology] ut on ut.Oid = u.Typology
						left outer join [UserTypologyGroup] utg on utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup
				where
                    pha.GCRecord is null and
					Year(pha.[Date]) >= Year(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and
					Month(pha.[Date]) >= Month(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and
					p.[Contract] = @ContractId
				group by
					u.Department,
					ut.Department,
					utg.Oid,
					pha.UserTypologyGroup,
					pha.[User]
				union all
				select
					v.Department,
					v.UserTypologyGroup,
					v.[User],
					0 as Rate,
					v.Rate as RateActual,
					0 as ContractedHours,
					0 as PlannedHours,
					0 as ForecastHours,
					sum(v.[Hours]) as ActualHours,
					sum(v.[Hours] - (v.AdministrativeHours + v.NewBusinessHours)) as BillableHours,
					sum(v.NewBusinessHours + v.AdministrativeHours) as NonBillableHours 
				from (
					select
						IsNull(t.UserDepartmentId, IsNull(d.Department, tp.Department)) as Department,
						utg.Oid as UserTypologyGroup,
						ssu.Oid as [User],
						p.Client,
						t.HourlyUserCost as Rate,
						iif(t.IsAdministrative = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0) as AdministrativeHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case 
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0 and 
										isnull(pc.Billable, 0) = 0
									)
									then 1 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as NewBusinessHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case 
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										(pc.Billable = 1 and isnull(jc.Billable, 0) = 0)
									) 
									then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as InternalWorkHours,
						IIF(
							(
								case
									when t.IsAdministrative = 0 and 
									(
										(pc.Billable = 1 or jc.Billable = 1)
									)
									then (t.[Hours] / 60.0) 
									else 0 
								end
							) = 1, (t.[Hours] / 60.0), 0
						) as BillableHours,
						(t.[Hours] / 60.0) as [Hours],
						t.TotalUserCost
					from	
						dbo.SkillTimesheetExpanded t
							inner join Project p ON (p.Oid = t.ProjectId AND p.[Contract] = @ContractId)
							left outer join SecuritySystemUser ssu on ssu.UserName = t.[User]
							left outer join ProjectClassification pc on (pc.Oid = p.Classification)
							left outer join Deliverable d on (d.Oid = t.DeliverableId)
							left outer join JobClassification jc on (jc.Oid = d.Classification)
							left outer join UserTypology tp on (tp.Oid = t.UserTypologyId)
							left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on (utg.Oid = tp.UserTypologyGroup)
					) v 
				group by
					v.Department,
					v.UserTypologyGroup,
					v.[User],
					v.Rate
			) v
			group by
				v.Department,
				v.UserTypologyGroup,
				v.[User]
		) v
			left outer join [User] u on u.Oid = v.[User]
			left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = v.UserTypologyGroup
			left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.Department
		group by 
			v.Department,
			d.[Name],
			v.UserTypologyGroup,
			utg.[Name],
			v.[User],
			u.[Name]
) v
left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'DeliverablesSellRead')"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: User Burn
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":19,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"Billable Time","metricFieldValue":"TotalBillableTime"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"Non-billable Time","metricFieldValue":"TotalNonBillableTime"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  t.[User],
		t.ContractedTime,
		t.BillableTime,
		t.NonBillableTime,
        sum(BillableTime) over() as TotalBillableTime,
        sum(NonBillableTime) over() as TotalNonBillableTime
from    (
        select  [User],
                sum(ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
                sum(BillableTime) as BillableTime,
                sum(NonBillableTime) as NonBillableTime
        from    (
                select  usr.Name as [User],
                        edt.Hours as ContractedTime,
                        0 as BillableTime,
                        0 as NonBillableTime
                from    Estimate est, EstimateItem eit, Contract cnt,
                        EstimateItemDetail edt left outer join [User] usr on usr.Oid = edt.[User]
                where   est.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                        eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
                        edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
                        edt.Type = 2
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and est.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                union all
                select  usr.Name as [User],
                        0 as ContractedTime,
                        iif(tim.Billable = 1 or tim.Billable is null, DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0, 0) as Billabletime,
                        iif(tim.Billable = 1 or tim.Billable is null, 0, DurationHours + DurationMinutes / 60.0) as NonBillabletime
                from    Timesheet tim, Project prj, Contract cnt, [User] usr
                where   tim.Project = prj.Oid and 
                        prj.Contract = cnt.Oid and
                        usr.Oid = tim.CreatedBy
                        /*[ContractFilter]*/ and prj.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
                ) t
        group by [User]
        ) t"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Group Contribution
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Utilization","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":36,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"BillableHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Planned","metricFieldValue":"PlannedHoursGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Contracted","metricFieldValue":"ContractedHoursGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"WITH ContractEstimateRates As
(
	select 
		eid.Department, eid.UserTypologyGroup, eid.[User], Max(eid.UnitPriceIncome) as UnitPriceIncome
	from
		dbo.Estimate e
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItem ei on (ei.Estimate = e.Oid)
		INNER JOIN dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid on (eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2)
	where 
		e.GCRecord is null 
		and (e.[Contract] = @ContractId)
		and cast(getdate() as Date) between e.[Date] and e.Expiration
	group by 
		eid.Department, 
		eid.UserTypologyGroup, 
		eid.[User]
)
SELECT
    v.[TypologyGroup],
	sum(v.[ActualHours]) as [ActualHours],
    sum(v.[BillableHours]) as BillableHours,
    sum(v.BillableHoursIncome) as BillableHoursIncome,
	sum(v.ContractedHours) as ContractedHours,
	sum(v.PlannedHours) as PlannedHours,
	IIF(sum(v.ContractedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.ContractedHours), 0.0) as ActualContractedPercentage,
	IIF(sum(v.PlannedHours) > 0, sum(v.BillableHours) / sum(v.PlannedHours), 0.0) as ActualPlannedPercentage,
	sum(sum(v.[BillableHours])) OVER () as BillableHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[PlannedHours])) OVER () as PlannedHoursGrandTotal,
    sum(sum(v.[ContractedHours])) OVER () as ContractedHoursGrandTotal
FROM  
(
	SELECT
		utg.[Name] as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		sum(eid.[Hours] * ei.retainer) as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.Estimate e,
		dbo.EstimateItem ei,
		dbo.EstimateItemDetail eid,
		dbo.UserTypologyGroup utg
	WHERE
		e.[Contract] = @ContractId
		AND ei.Estimate = e.Oid
		AND eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid AND eid.[Type] = 2
		AND utg.Oid = eid.UserTypologyGroup
	GROUP BY 
		utg.[Name]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		t.[TypologyGroup],
		sum(t.[Hours]) as [ActualHours],
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours))) as BillableHours,
		sum((t.[Hours] - (t.NewBusinessHours + t.AdministrativeHours)) * ISNULL(eidu.UnitPriceIncome, ISNULL(eidt.UnitPriceIncome, 0))) as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.SkillAnalyticsTimeUtilization t
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidu on (eidu.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidu.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidu.[User] = t.UserId)
		left outer join ContractEstimateRates eidt on (eidt.Department = t.DepartmentId AND eidt.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupId AND eidt.[User] is null)
	WHERE
		t.[TypologyGroup] IS NOT NULL
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and t.[ProjectContractId] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		t.[TypologyGroup]
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name]) as [TypologyGroup],
		0 as [ActualHours],
		0 as BillableHours,
		0 as BillableHoursIncome,
		0 as ContractedHours,
		SUM((ISNULL(pht.PlannedMinutes, 0) / 60.0)) as PlannedHours
	FROM   
		dbo.PlannedHoursTotal pht
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] u ON (u.Oid = pht.[User])
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypology] ut ON (ut.Oid = u.Typology)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utg ON (utg.Oid = ut.UserTypologyGroup)
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserTypologyGroup] utgp ON (utgp.Oid = pht.UserTypologyGroup),
		dbo.Project p
	WHERE
		pht.GCRecord is null
		AND p.Oid = pht.Project
		/*[/ContractFilter]*/ and p.[Contract] = @ContractId /*[/ContractFilter]*/
	GROUP BY 
		ISNULL(utgp.[Name], utg.[Name])
) v
GROUP BY
	v.TypologyGroup"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
